hintFirstPage: Now is the first page, can not turn forward
hintLastPage: Now is the last page, can not turn the page
startSketchMessage: The countdown begins, Have a nice day.
do_you_reset_all_settings: Do you want to reset to the default settings?
not_support_fullscreen: This browser does not support full screen
no_book_found_hint: No book found, try uploading a file?
drop_to_upload: Click or drag files to this area to upload
uploaded_folder_hint: Files are uploaded by default to the upload folder in the executive directory
scanned_hint: Scan a total of XX books, and watch it immediately?
no_support_upload_file: Although coming here, the server's upload file function was turned off by the administrator
please_enable_upload: Please enable server upload file support
login_success_hint: Login successfully, return to previous page
author: Author:{0}
OpenBrowser_Description: Open browser after scanning is completed. windows defaults to true, other platforms defaults to false.
StoresPath_Description: Absolute and relative directories are supported. Relative directories are based on the current execution directory
MaxScanDepth_Description:
Maximum scan depth. 
Files exceeding the depth will not be scanned. 
The current execution directory is the base.
MinImageNum_Description: A compressed flie or folder must contain at least a few pictures to be considered a book.
TimeoutLimitForScan_Description: When scanning a file, if it takes more than a few seconds, it will give up scanning the file to avoid getting stuck on an overly large file.
UploadPath_Description: Customize the storage location of uploaded files. By default, the upload folder is created in the current execution directory.
ZipFileTextEncoding_Description:
Non-utf-8 encoded ZIP file, what encoding should be used to parse it. 
Default GBK.
ExcludePath_Description: When scanning books, the names of files or folders that need to be excluded
SupportMediaType_Description: Image file suffix used to count the number of images when scanning compressed packages
SupportFileType_Description: When scanning a file, it is used to decide whether to skip or count it as a file suffix for book processing.
Port_Description: Web service port. This configuration does not support hot reloading.
Host_Description:
Customize the host name displayed by the QR code. 
The default is the network card IP.
DisableLAN_Description: Reading services are only provided on this machine and are not shared externally. This configuration does not support hot reloading.
EnableLogin_Description: Whether to enable login. No login is required by default. This configuration does not support hot reload.
Username_Description: After enabling login, the username required for the login interface.
Password_Description: After enabling login, the password used to log in.
Timeout_Description: Cookie expiration time after enabling login. The unit is minutes. It expires in 180 minutes by default.
EnableTLS_Description: Whether to enable HTTPS protocol. The certificate needs to be set in the key file.
EnableDatabase_Description: Enable local database to save scanned book data. This configuration does not support hot reload.
ClearDatabaseWhenExit_Description: When the local database is enabled, non-existing books are purged after the scan is completed.
LogToFile_Description: Whether to save the program log to a local file. Not saved by default.
GenerateMetaData_Description: Generate book metadata. Not currently in effect.
ClearCacheExit_Description: When exiting the program, clear the web image cache.
CachePath_Description: Local image cache location, default system temporary folder.
